application_type_full: Full planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Installation of replacement windows first floor, replacement of side and rear doors, installation of new rooflights,  replacement skylight, replacement existing roof light glazing, replacement roof tiles, replacement ventilation extract, replacement front railings, demolition of lean to structure to side of property, replacement bin store and associated works of refurbishment in conjunction with its continued use as a community centre and restaurant.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-83603c97-7fff-dcc7-7f84-392ec8839f42"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><i>REASON: </i>To ensure that the development integrates with the host building and special regard is paid to the character and appearance of the Conservation Area </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">No new grilles, satellite dishes, aerials, meter boxes, security alarms, lighting, security or other cameras or other fixtures or plant shall be mounted on the external faces or roof of the building other than those shown on the drawings hereby approved.</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-be704e57-7fff-9a0c-6860-81ff9927e5e4"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">To ensure that the development integrates with the host building and special regard is paid to the character and appearance of the Conservation Area </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">All new and replacement external rainwater and soil pipes shall be of traditional design, formed in cast iron and painted black.&nbsp;</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d1afb7f2-7fff-e7d2-9d5f-94e68073fb99"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">To ensure that the development integrates with the host building and special regard is paid to the character and appearance of the Conservation Area </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">The development hereby approved shall provide two swift boxes close to the eaves prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-7a0c8483-7fff-88d7-63ee-fb732c0dd2b1"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); background-color: transparent; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interest of biodiversity.</span></p>
<p>No dining and/or drinking, associated with any use of the premises, shall take place other than inside, at all times.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: In the interests on residential amenity.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">Before occupation a hard and soft landscaping scheme shall be submitted to and approved in&nbsp; writing by the Local Planning Authority. The scheme shall include details of all walls, fences, trees and other planting which are to be retained; details of all new walls, fences, other boundary treatment and finished ground levels; details of the hard surface treatment of open parts of the site which shall be permeable or drained to a permeable area; a planting specification to include the species, size, position and method of planting of all new trees and shrubs; and a programme of implementation. All hard and soft landscaping works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. The works shall be carried out prior to the occupation of any part of the development unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Any trees or plants indicated on the approved scheme which, within a period of five years from the date of planting, die, are removed or become seriously damaged, diseased or dying shall be replaced during the next planting season with other trees or plants of a location, species and size to be first approved in writing by the Local&nbsp; Planning Authority. All hard landscape works shall be permanently retained in accordance with the approved details.</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e4cb53c4-7fff-9ff6-a950-62a64c3e7f96"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to the character and appearance of the Conservation Area </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">Detailed drawings and full particulars of the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of works. The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</span><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">a) Notwithstanding the approved drawings and documents, details of the proposed replacement first floor steel windows;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">b) Notwithstanding the approved drawings and documents, details of the proposed anti-climb spikes to the roofs;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">c) Details of the proposed railings to the universal access ramp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">d) Details of the proposed glazing to all new rooflights and the new atrium lantern;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">e) Details of the proposed anti-climb gates and fences;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">f) Details of the proposed refuse and cycle stores.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-eecc9d42-7fff-f0cd-ced8-cb7962a7760b"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">To ensure that the development integrates with the host building and special regard is paid to the character and appearance of the Conservation Area </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">No soil stacks, soil vent pipes, plumbing, pipes, flues, vents or ductwork shall be fixed on the external faces of the building other than those shown on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp;</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6c90363d-7fff-32bd-05c4-f1c0058cdc57"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to the host building and character and appearance of the Conservation Area </span></p>

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
